title: [Jastev Amphitheater]
description: Tiers of carved stone seats descend in orderly, semi-circular waves toward a stage at the lower end of the open-air amphitheater.  Overhead, the sky provides a black velvet ceiling, sparkling with stars and the moons.  Cerulean blue stage curtains as well as the stage itself are shielded from any inclement weather by an overhanging roof.

Tiers of carved stone seats descend in orderly, semi-circular waves toward a stage at the lower end of the open-air amphitheater.  Overhead, the sky provides a brilliant blue ceiling, studded with occasional passing clouds.  Cerulean blue stage curtains as well as the stage itself are shielded from any inclement weather by an overhanging roof.
